name: Memoirs of Amorous Novelist
nutshell:
Perverts are people who know the shape of their desires. They have carefully traced those contours like a blind man using both hands to measure the shape of a vase. Colette works in a brothel in early 20th century Paris, an occupation she can't escape. She and the other girls support each other, satisfying the desires of their clients, day in, day out. The one source of hope in her difficult life was her trysts with Leon. But Colette could never be sure if Leon really loved her… The strength of women in their pleasurable confines; the naked desires of the 'amorous gentlemen.'


Won the 23rd Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Award in 2020

name: She is mine
nutshell: The elite private tutor, Min Jiang Xi, who is good at "pretending", managed to clinch the CEO Qin Zhan as a client. He, who hates women flocking towards him, warns that "he simply lacks a tutor, not a girlfriend". As he instructed, she is courteous and distant, never crossing the boundaries. But one year later, a drunk Qin Zhan states that "I won’t force you to like me, so don’t force me to not like you. I can’t do it". Can she, who doesn’t believe in love, find it with him?

name: Urban Rebellion
nutshell: The Taoist god-killer brings the nine-day stone to life in the city, He can refine the alchemy, refine the tools, and understand the methods of battle, and sees how Lin Fan hangs all evil in the city, stepping to the top, overlooking the living beings step by step.

name: Urban Best Medic
nutshell: The immortal doctor Lu Ning, will reveal the truth and cure the non-curable disease, but the next step is his fiance, the ice cold female president, beautiful and pretty like flowers, and to win her heart. In the future, he have to face counterattack, danger in this big world.

name: The princess's shop
tags: Reincarnation,Time Travel,Official Colored,Historical,Long Strip,Romance,Harem,Isekai,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell:
Que devait faire une femme dans les temps anciens ? Tomber amoureuse ou avoir un beau garçon ? NON !
Bien sûr, je dois faire fortune en utilisant mes connaissances modernes pour faire des affaires !
Qu'en est-il des affaires de beauté, de fitness et de natation dans l'Antiquité ? Voulez-vous des jouets éducatifs pour enfants ?
Une femme moderne a voyagé dans le temps jusqu'aux temps anciens et trompe l'empereur en jouant avec le prince.
Que ce soit son amour d'enfance et ses amants, aucun ne peuvent se comparer au fait de gagner de l'argent à ses yeux !
Vous voulez la courtiser ? Parlons des qualifications après avoir gagné autant d'argent qu'elle a entre les mains !

name: Shinobi Life
nutshell: Energetic and strong-willed, Beni doesn't care if she lives or dies as long as her death will result in embarassing her arrogant father! But one day, she suddenly encounters Kagetora, a ninja who's fallen from the sky and swears complete loyalty to her – as her bodyguard. Kagetora has time traveled from a long, long time ago, and has devoted his life to protecting Princess Beni. Little does Kagetora know that this Beni is not the real princess… Can true love and honor survive after a centuries-long time warp – in a crazy modern world?

name: Nanako-san Teki na Nichijou
nutshell: Nanako is an athletic and carefree girl. But she is too carefree, and she often ends up in embarrassing situations, most of which are witnessed by her classmate Kawara, who, like any normal guy, enjoys it very much.

name: Kinjirareta Koi ni Ochite
nutshell:
A collection of oneshots that would make you want to love!!


Kimi no Hada wo Kowasu Yoru by Kitagawa Miyuki
If you put a picture of yourself in the frame, you'll find love. If you put a picture of two lovers together, they'll soon marry. Maaya has come to secure a contract with Akihito Kiriyama, the glass artisan who makes these magical frames. However, she accidentally breaks a piece worth $50,000 and to pay back the debt, he buys her…?


Harukaze by Ichii Kazumi
Soon-to-be-married Madoka talks to the boy who encouraged her 2 years ago to…


Gitai Requiem by Natsumi Rin
Dull Masago changes after one glance. It feels like something in her has awakened…!


Rennai Shinkoukei by Uryuu Hanako
Coworkers Homare and Juri are dating each other in secret, and the Executive Secretary of their company nominates them as…


Oujisama♥Sniper by Hata Kimi
Takahashi-kun, whom she met at a party at her job, is really straightforward and keeps pressuring her…!

name: Akudama
nutshell: High school student Morisaki did something unfortunate, based on just the slightest passing fancy: for the first time in his life, he shoplifted. However, it was caught on camera by a decent member of society named Harata. After Morisaki pleads with him to keep it a secret, Harata attempts to extort Morisaki. "If you keep me company so I can kill some time, I'll keep your secret."

name: Fenrir-nee-san to Boku
nutshell: Haijima Yousuke, bored of life, casually wishes for the world to be destroyed, even though he hates fighting and involving himself with people. And yet, when a terrifying monster suddenly appears and strikes down his beautiful upperclassman Kitami Touka right before him, Haijima knows that this time, he must fight. However, there seems to be more to Kitami than Haijima originally thought.

name: It started with a Wi-Fi network name
tags: Official Colored,Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,User Created,Drama,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: Two lonely persons, two different fates. Him, a weak guy that suffers from albinism and permanent near-sighted. Her, an unwanted child, ostracized at school because she doesn't speak Vietnamese... In a twisted fate, they found themselves connected through Wi-Fi Network Names, but will their relationship last?

tags: Long Strip,Romance,Boys' Love,Drama,School Life,Web Comic,Supernatural,Full Color
nutshell: After living in December 24th, Christmas Eve on endless repeat- Mokhwa seems to be the only one who's aware of the existence of the time loop. And on this repeated day, he spends time with his childhood friend 'Choi Gyun' despite having cut ties with him a long time ago.

name: FusionFall: Worlds Collide
nutshell: This is the official manga for the new defunct Cartoon Network MMO by Grigon Entertainment: FusionFall.

name: Majo no Biyaku
nutshell:
Kaoruko Mochizuki runs an herb shop in a small seaside town. One day, a mysterious man dressed in black named Kaname Hibiki enters her shop and reveals that Kaoruko is actually a witch. And what’s more, Kaoruko needs Kaname to help control her awakening power!
Among the shocking news that Kaname imparts is that Kaoruko’s mother is still alive and has entrusted Kaoruko with the immense power of the Witch Queen. As long as Kaoruko has that power, she will be the target of humans and demonic spirits alike. Kaname claims to be a “knight” that protects witches, but then he steals a kiss from Kaoruko…!
(es-MX):
En la historia, Kaoruko tiene una pequeña tienda de hierbas después de perder a sus padres cuando ella era joven. Un d� a, un misterioso hombre vestido de negro entra en la tienda. Kaoruko está a punto de descubrir la verdadera naturaleza de este hombre llamado Kaname Hibiki.
Pt/Br:
Kaoruko, uma humilde moça, dirige uma loja de ervas que pertencia à sua falecida avó, que era sua guardiã desde a perda de seus pais, quando era apenas uma criança. Cercada por uma vida pacata na loja, ela tem sua vida mudada com o começo de acontecimentos estranhos, dentre eles a aparição constante de animais e a atração sobrenatural que exercia em homens. Foi então que um estranho homem vestido em um terno negro entra em sua vida e revela que sua mãe não está morta, e mais, que ela era a mais poderosa das bruxas, e tal poder foram herdado por Kaoruko. Kaname Hibiki, o estranho homem de terno, diz que lhe foi dada a ordem de protegê-la contra os efeitos do poder e das pessoas que o tentassem tomar o mesmo. Mas, durante o dever, ele é afetado pelos poderes de atração de Kaoruko e eles acabam se beijando. Kaoruko agora é uma bruxa, como ela irá lidar com isso? Hibiki resistirá à atração fatal dos poderes de Kaoruko e cumprirá seu dever? Uma coisa é certa, a vida daquela pacata moça nunca mais será a mesma…

name: Gameko no Chouhoroku
nutshell: Kurosawa Mako, nick-named "Game-ko" (roughly "stingy girl"), makes money by selling her homework, class notes & bentou and by offering services like tutoring for exams, writing class reports, switching cleaning duties, hair-styling for the girls in the class, giving massage to her classmates etc. But there is a reason why she has taken to these weird money-making ways…

name: Machi no Yakuza to Panya-san
nutshell: Hatori, an intellectual Yakuza, has a secret hobby of visiting bakeries. He discovered a certain bakery that is open late at night run by the baker Ayase, and engages in a lively discussion about pastries. But when he woke up, he discovered that he's being eaten by Ayase…?! A "delicious" and "dangerous" relationship between a baker and a yakuza.

name: Cardcaptor Sakura - Milk Crown (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Touya is bugged by Sakura in the snow, and Sakura is bugged by Touya at home. But despite their ups and downs, the brother and sister still love one another. <3 Maybe a little… too much…

name: World's End Harem - Semi-Colored Edition
nutshell: The Man-Killer Virus: a lethal disease that has eradicated 99.9% of the world's male population. Mizuhara Reito has been in cryogenic sleep for the past five years, leaving behind Tachibana Erisa, the girl of his dreams. When Reito awakens from the deep freeze, he emerges into a sex-crazed new world where he himself is the planet's most precious resource. Reito and four other male studs are given lives of luxury and one simple mission: repopulate the world by impregnating as many women as possible! All Reito wants, however, is to find his beloved Erisa who went missing three years ago. Can Reito resist temptation and find his one true love?

name: Tetsuya - The Man Called Mahjong Master
nutshell:
Based on the life of a famous Mahjong Novelist, Asada Tetsuya, this manga chronicles the history of the man who is now known as the "Mahjong Saint" in his journey through the world of Mahjong and gambling in general.
In the year 1947, the people of Shinjuku are down on their luck. With little money to buy food or necessities, some resort to gambling in order to survive. Traveling Tetsuya chooses to spend his time at Mahjong parlors where he is wiping the floor clean with his adversaries. However, Tetsuya meets the intensely-skilled Boushu-san, this is when he realizes that his skills are still lacking.


Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2000

name: Jack Frost
nutshell:
It’s Noh-A’s first day at Amityville High School, and her reception is chilly to say the least. Brutal might be a better description! Decapitated but not dead (or is she??), Noh-A quickly realizes that nothing is as it appears at Amityville High where paranormal creatures battle for supremacy. Caught in the crossfire, Noh-A may have to rely on the unlikely (and possibly unreliable) aid of the most sinister student at Amityville… the deadly Jack Frost!
Wikipedia
English
Italian
Swedish

name: Anitsuu!
nutshell: After the remarriage of his father, Takara finds himself becoming the eldest of the 4 siblings. Wanting to try his best as the oldest brother, Takara ends up stumbling and tumbling with his relationship between his 3 younger siblings. Each chapter tells the tale of how Takara bonds with each sibling.

name: Kaihatsu BL Hajimete no ××
nutshell:
Iya! Shi, Iyasare?!
Artist: Niyama
Description: A masseuse jokingly offers an erotic massage to a regular client who has ED due to a previous trauma, but the client unexpectedly accepts?!

name: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Appmon Academy!!
nutshell: Appli Monsters: Appmon Academy!! is a manga spin-off of Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters, focusing on the Appmon in a school setting.

name: The Witches' End
nutshell: The story of "me" who abandoned humans and a witch, who had her whole race killed.

name: The Strongest Demon Becomes the Protagonist's Strategist
Hot Mother
nutshell: She is the top killer of the killer employment center. Her auntie throwed her to a strange man. When she wanted to ask who was the child's father, Auntie's feet ran away… Six years later, the baby was caught by the black empire. In desperation, she was disguised as a man pretending to be a driver lurking into the black empire boss side to do undercover…

name: I Must Spoil You
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell:
Eng
Feeling full of despair, Tao Di bumped into "physician" during the house emergency call. The reserved man stared at her with the look of deep love, spoke in a resolute tone, "Girl, if you don't mind, let's experience a flash marriage!" In anger, Tao Di agreed to marry him. Who'd knew that later, she would discover her husband's secrets?
Ru
Тао Ди узнала, что жених изменил ей прямо перед свадьбой. В порыве отчаяния она согласилась на предложение незнакомого доктора выйти за него замуж. Только вот хватит ли ей решимости остаться с новоиспечённым мужем, раскрыв все его скелеты в шкафу?
По роману Чу Чэн.
 «Мгновенным» в Китае называют брак, заключенный между партнерами, которые знают друг друга меньше месяца.

name: Welcome to Harukaze - A Mahjong Guesthouse Story
nutshell: A heartwarming human drama about a high school boy who lives with his sisters at a small guesthouse in Izu called "Harukaze" and interacts with people who visit the guesthouse for various reasons through mahjong and casual conversation.

name: Reideen
nutshell: Saiga Junki is a normal high school boy who tends to be a little apathetic in general but who does manage to get better than average grades. When his archaeologist father, who went to investigate some ruins, is found dead, the family travels to the excavation site where Junki meets a mysterious stranger who gives him a gift: an ancient artifact that his father left for him

name: Amazing Hana
nutshell: The story follows a middle-aged, divorced manga creator who can't get his works to sell. One day, he meets a stunningly beautiful girl, and his life begins to change.
